titles.title: We've A Story To Tell To The Nations (hymn of

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For the darkness shall turn to dawning And the dawning to noonday bright And Christ's great kingdom shall come to earth The kingdom of love and light{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We've a story to tell to the nations That shall turn their hearts to the right A story of truth and mercy A story of peace and light A story of peace and light{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We've a song to be sung to the nations That shall lift their hearts to the Lord A song that shall conquer evil And shatter the spear and sword And shatter the spear and sword{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We've a message to give to the nations That the Lord who reigneth above Hath sent us His Son to save us And show us that God is love And show us that God is love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We've a Saviour to show to the nations Who the path of sorrow has trod That all of the world's great peoples Might come to the truth of God Might come to the truth of God{/lang-eng}
